name: Lone Formation
description:
You get lost deep inside the enemy line after an failed attempt to destroy their base but you manage to stay alive, now try to rebuild your fleet back to finish the missions.

Controls:

KeyActionW/A/S/DMovementSpaceBuy ship

Key can be change in the setting.

Credits:

An thank to MCKL for the Red Hat Text & Red Hat Mono font.

Programming/Art by Huntrt

Sound by Huntrt using BFXR

Music by Huntrt using Bosca Ceoil
